radiographic_examinations.findings: A 2.1 cm area of hypoenhancement is seen in the right hepatic lobe along the falciform ligament possibly reflecting focal fatty deposition; a tiny hypodensity in the lateral left kidney likely representing a renal cyst; the appendix is dilated to 13 mm; a new fluid collection adjacent to the tip of the appendix measuring 4.2 x 4.4 x 2.7 cm suggestive of perforation.
